name: Slugs Destroyer
description:
Slugs Destroyer is an atypical adventure platformer in the 2D world: you do not need to hurry to anywhere. Explore every cube of this world! Pass through enemies and obstacles.
Here you are waiting for the beauty of pixel graphics with your atmosphere. Simple control will let you relax in this game.
There are two game modes for you: the story and fight for points. In story mode you will have to bring back the sun to the people of flying island. The sun was hidden by old man that made a spell. You can't arrange with him easily! You will have to pass bats, slugs, cave with lava, and kill the one you made that way for - a giant slug! Kill it and the old man will return the sun!
In fight mode defend from slugs and bats and try to do the best score! That fascinating world is created for you in the game "Slugs Destroyer!".
